Class Wavelet

  • java.lang.Object
    • Wavelet

  • public class Wavelet
extends java.lang.Object
    Haar Wavelet Conversion Program
    Author:
    Evan Ballinger Created for CS 4050 Spring 2019 Dr. Georgiev

    • Constructor Detail

      • Wavelet

        public Wavelet(java.lang.String functionString,
               java.lang.String fileNameString)
        Parameters:
        functionString - Command line argument denotes program function
        fileNameString - Name of file to be converted or reverted For both functions, the image is read into a class member matrix of double values representing pixel color values. The conversion is done on the matrix and then the matrix is written to a new output image file.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        This is the main runner method which verifies user command lind parameters and runs the program by instantiating the Wavelet class.

      • compressImage

        private void compressImage()
        Contains top level logic to compress an image using Haar Wavelet Transformation.

      • transformRow

        private void transformRow(int rowNumber,
                          int size)
        Parameters:
        rowNumber - Row Number of pixelMatrix to be converted
        size - Size parameter shrinks by a factor of 2 for each pass through the conversion process

      • transformCol

        private void transformCol(int colNumber,
                          int size)
        Parameters:
        colNumber - Column number of pixelMatrix to be converted
        size - parameter shrinks by a factor of 2 for each pass through the conversion process

      • revertRow

        private void revertRow(int rowNumber,
                       int size)
        Parameters:
        rowNumber - Row number to be reverted
        size - When reverting an image, the size grows by a factor of 2 for each iteration of the reversion process

      • revertCol

        private void revertCol(int colNumber,
                       int size)
        Parameters:
        colNumber - Column number to be reverted
        size - When reverting an image, the size grows by a factor of 2 for each iteration of the reversion process

      • oneDimensionRevert

        private double[] oneDimensionRevert(double[] array)
        Parameters:
        array - Input array to be reverted
        Returns:
        A new array converted based on the input array

      • oneDimensionTransform

        private double[] oneDimensionTransform(double[] array)
        Parameters:
        array - Array of double values to be converted using the 1 dimension Haar Wavelet Transformation
        Returns:
        Returns a new array
